custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT KaleoProcess.kaleoProcessId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM KaleoProcess INNER JOIN DDLRecordSet ON DDLRecordSet.recordSetId = KaleoProcess.DDLRecordSetId WHERE (KaleoProcess.groupId = ?) AND ( (lower(DDLRecordSet.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDLRecordSet.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {KaleoProcess.*} FROM KaleoProcess INNER JOIN DDLRecordSet ON DDLRecordSet.recordSetId = KaleoProcess.DDLRecordSetId WHERE (KaleoProcess.groupId = ?) AND ( (lower(DDLRecordSet.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDLRecordSet.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY KaleoProcess.kaleoProcessId DESC
